sections.title: Robots! All you need to know!
sections.description: Someone is crawling your site to get data

sections.title: What is a robot?
sections.description: Automated software to crawl, process, analyze, verify, and extract data from a given website.

sections.title: How a (good) bot works?
sections.description:
A robot may being parsing a full website or a single site of your page. It will parse a single page if it was discovered via links.

When parsing a domain, a good bot will parse a robots.txt. When parsing a page, a good bot will look for your page meta tags.
